idea-plugin.name: Base16 Black Metal (Dark Funeral)
idea-plugin.vendor: metalelf0 (https://github.com/metalelf0), Shirom Makkad, and the Base16 project
idea-plugin.description:
Base 16 Black Metal (Dark Funeral) for Jetbrains IDE


---------------


Colors by metalelf0 (https://github.com/metalelf0). Theme made using base16(https://github.com/chriskempson/base16). Theme generated by Shirom Makkad (https://github.com/ShiromMakkad/base16-jetbrains-ide)
